summary:
I would like to look for a graduate trainee or junior product developer or related post in food industry, preferably in R&D in where skills, knowledge and expertise gained and further professional development achieved.

I believe that my education, working experience and my personality make me a strong candidate in job market. I am willing and able to work well with multi-cultural and different colleagues. I would like to work in a company where can provide me an opportunity to broaden my overall knowledge of how a multi-faceted, multi-national corporation operates.
